name: bar_aspect_ratio_study_sliced_by_space_type_retail
display_name: Bar Aspect Ratio Study Sliced by Space Type Retail

arguments.name: ns_to_ew_ratio
arguments.display_name: Ratio of North/South Facade Length Relative to East/West Facade Length

arguments.name: retail
arguments.display_name: Fraction of Floor Area for Retail Space Type

arguments.name: point_of_sale
arguments.display_name: Fraction of Floor Area for Point of Sale Space Type

arguments.name: entry
arguments.display_name: Fraction of Floor Area for Entry Space Type

arguments.name: back_space
arguments.display_name: Fraction of Floor Area for BackSpace Space Type

name_xml: Bar Aspect Ratio Study Sliced By Space Type Retail
modeler_description: Instead of taking a hash of space type names and fractions, this has a double argument for each standards space type for a Retail. This is intended to be used in a model where only one space type exists for each standards space type field. If there are multiple possible space types you may not get the expected results.
description: This measure will create a building envelope based on a target floor area, aspect ratio, floor to floor height, and a collection of space types and fraction of building using that space type.
